entry.summary: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie County including Cheyenne. * WHEN...From this evening through Saturday afternoon.
